comments.comments_text: Romelu Lukaku (Manchester United) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Manchester Utd will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: Yellow card! It's like Eder Balanta (Basel) was asking for a caution with his behaviour. Ruddy Buquet agrees and books him.

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Marouane Fellaini (Manchester United) bursts into the box to get on the end of a whipped in cross from Ashley Young and scores magnificently from close range low into the middle of the goal. 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Daley Blind launches a beautiful lofted cross into the box, where Romelu Lukaku (Manchester United) rises high to head the ball into the right side of the goal and beyond the goalkeeper. 2:0.

comments.comments_text: Today's referee Ruddy Buquet rightly decides to book Daley Blind (Manchester United) for his harsh tackle.

comments.comments_text: Michael Lang (Basel) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Ruddy Buquet didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

comments.comments_text: Romelu Lukaku (Manchester United) wasted a big chance to finish after the resulting free kick! He latched on to a well-placed cross deep inside the box and produced a fine header towards the net! The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Manchester Utd.
